reviews.title: Excellent tool for team collaboration
reviews.review_text: Notion has transformed how our team organizes and collaborates. The flexibility to create custom databases and pages is unmatched.

reviews.title: Great for documentation
reviews.review_text: We use Notion primarily for documentation. The markdown support and page linking make it perfect for our needs.

reviews.title: Could use better mobile app
reviews.review_text: The desktop version is fantastic, but the mobile app needs improvement. Still, overall a solid product.
